critical.title: /press and /present endpoints have no rate limiting
critical.impact: Unauthenticated flood of render_directive events via rapid /press calls

critical.title: Twitch !objection emits count: -1 sentinel; nothing increments it
critical.impact: SSE listeners receive count=-1, corrupting overlay and dashboard UI state

important.title: /api/metrics endpoint not documented; operator runbook contradicts
TWITCH_EVENTSUB_SECRET in .env.example is unused in code
event-taxonomy.md render_directive payload shows flat pose/face vs actual map
Dashboard App.tsx duplicates session-snapshot event mapping logic

minor.title: inferRenderDirective only matches keywords with trailing !
record:sse script flags not in docs/api.md
